name: Archdesk
slogan: Archdesk ERP, designed & developed for the construction industry
description: Archdesk ERP is on a mission to improve productivity of specialist contractors in the construction industry. We streamline the work of the back office of many fabricators, service providers and other specialist contractors in the UK.

team.name: Michal Mojzesz
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder & CEO @Archdesk Improving productivity of construction industry companies with the help of modern software.

jobs.title: Sales Development Representative
jobs.description:
At Archdesk we are passionate about improving the productivity of construction companies, specifically specialist contractors. We offer modern software for their back office operations as well as work in the field management.

You will be working alongside and reporting directly to the CEO and CMO. 

If you are thinking big and want to join in a very early team, apply!

Description of the role: 
- 70% of the time spend on meeting clients face to face at their offices.
- Combination of outbound and inbound lead qualification.
- Defining sales strategy, smoothing out sales and on-boarding process.
- Real input in the company sales process working alongside founders.
- Participation in various industry events.
- Job is based on London, however being in the office all the time is not a must; We expect you to be on the road most of the time and on the phone with potential customers. You need to have the ability to travel widely outside of London at a short notice.

We are looking for:
- Experience in previously selling a SaaS at a value of £1000+ per month.
- Passionate, ambitious and hardworking people with a proven track record.
- Passionate about improving company's efficiency.  
- Goal orientated and an owner of a quote at a previous position
- Friendly and outgoing.
- Strong verbal and writing skills.
- Comfortable in making many outbound calls a day.
- Prior experience in B2B SaaS sales.
- Interest in the construction / building industry (Willingness to learn).
- Ability to adjust quickly to a changing startup environment.

What can we offer:
- Attractive basic salary, plus results based incentive
- Early employee OTE (Very attractive).
- Early employee shares.
- Company car.

Starting ASAP.

Please submit your covering letter and CV to jobs@archdesk.co.uk
